EXTRACTED VALUE: This is the kind of game Xbox Live Arcade was made for. [Holiday 2007, p.73]
Vince McMahaon may not be dead, but the Smackdown vs. Raw series is just barely avoiding life support.
Blazing Angels is a victim of its subject matter. Maybe this is why there aren’t many WWII air combat games.
Worms offers almost limitless level designs, great multiplayer action for 4 people online and off and a basic but vital ingredient for any game – fun!
Conan may at times be awkward and slightly derivative, but when compared to the fun that is available within, these shortcomings pale in comparison.
For a mere $10, Assault Heroes 2 is hands-down one of the better values on the Xbox Live Arcade.
Not as thrilling as previous titles, but it's a brave new direction. [Christmas 2007, p.70]
